title: Negative RP and possible IP purchase / balance bug [CLIENT]

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
I have a current problem in client with a RP / IP bug and I wonder if it's client or account specific. It shows that I have negative RP / less RP after buying a champion / skin when that is not the case, I previously had 1974 RP prior to purchasing the Demon Vi skin. Now it current displays as negative 729 RP. 

The IP bug 2 months happened when I purchased Amumu for allegedly 450 IP but it charged me 1350 IP for it. I thought it was a visual error and thought nothing of it since I do not worry too much over IP. 

The steps it seems to reproducing this bug (I hope it's not account specific) is:

1) Purchase RP (Which I have not done in months)
2) Purchase something from the store. (The in store difference calculator was correct for RP, strangely)
3) Watch RP / IP counter closely.

Here is a current screen shot of my balance / problem.

**EDIT: It appears to fix itself with the correct RP balance (621 RP) after restarting the client. Still a worrisome / annoying bug.**

replies.body:
Hey Silver V Slacker,

Thanks for the report! This is a legacy error with the client. We're aware of it!
Is it going to be fixed with the current client or the new client? Just curious lol.
Not 100% sure on this, but I'd guess new client.
